name: @aws-lambda/mds-metrics-sheet
description: AWS Lambda for MDS Metrics Sheet

scripts.lambda:develop-metrics-sheet: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name develop-metrics-sheet --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/metrics-log.zip
scripts.lambda:develop-metrics-sheet-geo: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name develop-metrics-sheet-geo --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/vehicle-counts.zip

author: City of Los Angeles
